ygData.subject: Re: Specialization
ygData.msgSnippet: Alteration overall was probably a good choice. Reason being the lifetap line while not good for dd at high levels are quite good at healing yourself if your
ygData.messageBody:
Alteration overall was probably a good choice. Reason being the lifetap line
while not good for dd at high levels are quite good at healing yourself if
your soloing or happen to get a mob on you. The casting time is extremly big
on that line and it's nice to have it speed up some. Plus there are some
other benefits. In specilize you either go with alteration probably number
once choice or conjuration. So you'll be just fine.

Naeeldar

-----Original Message-----
From: wehaushalter@... <wehaushalter@...>
To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
Date: Friday, October 08, 1999 8:32 AM
Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] Specialization


>From: wehaushalter@...
>
>Sorry if this topic has been beat to death, but my Specialization
>in Alteration just went over 50 and I was wondering if that was
>good or bad. I figured it should be either Alteration or Conjuration.
>I really like the Darkness line and they seem to be mostly
>Conjuration based.
>
>Barnon
>25th Level Necro of Povar
>
>>This list is basically unmoderated. However abusive language will not be
tolerated
